name: Cast of Iron
description: The player explores a large Steampunk inspired castle, collecting scrap, currency used to power themselves and their arsenal of weapons up, as well as collecting Artifacts that can be found throughout the castle to grant powerful abilities during each run, and using these abilities to avoid and destroy their enemies to clear the castle and destroy it. In the Demo version of the game, the map is pre-loaded to showcase the core gameplay elements of the game, but in the full version, the map will be procedurally generated, and multiple levels will be included for the player to clear, and task the player with navigating the ever-changing labyrinths. The player’s aim is to power up and clear the castles by becoming progressively stronger with each run through the castle, emphasising exploration and upgrading.
